thread.title: Thermalabs Natural Self Tanner Now Selling In France And Germany
thread.title_full: Thermalabs Natural Self Tanner Now Selling In France And Germany | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: Thermalabs Natural Self Tanner Now Selling In France And Germany
text:
(MENAFN Press) has availed two of its products in both Germany and France Amazon website. German and French citizens can now purchase the Natural Self Tanner Thermalabs pilot product and the Ultimitt Thermalabs third product in their country.  This move by Thermalabs is a strategic gig to widen its  market. Thermalabs has now availed the two products in 4 countries; US Israel Germany and France. This might also be a significant step by Thermalabs to affirm its vision which is to promote a skin cancer free world. In the near future it won't be a surprise to see Thermalabs availing its products in more countries.
Seaside Beauty an Amazon reviewer said "I was a little worried at first when I got these because I have very pale skin but once I sat down and read the directions I was ready to give it a shot. It is very easy to apply and rubs on just like a wipe would. I just used it on my arms and legs at first to see how it would come out and I have to say I was very pleased with the results. It didn't turn me orange like some others I had used in the past and it also didn't make me so dark that it was completely unbelievable. I really like these. After that first application I actually went ahead and did the rest of my body and had alot of people ask me if I had been tanning. I will definitely continue to use these over summer because I will never have the time to go get a real tan and this is just as good. I received this product at a promotional price in exchange for my honest and unbiased review."
About Thermalabs
Thermalabs was created with a vision to create a skin cancer free world. Their products provide users the freedom of getting an attractive tan without having to worry about skin cancer. In their ongoing effort to become the best  brand in the world the company strives to create products that are the best in every way. All these products are easy to use and they provide the license to look beautiful and feel healthy at the same time.
